entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegisteredWaitHandle.Portable.cs + UnregisterPortableCore #106930
  • CG2 test followups #106929
  • [API Proposal]: Support General Math value creation without sign propagation #106927
  • [API Proposal]: Having negative indices for indexing from the end and wrapping / circular indexing from a starting index #106919
  • Fast path for {U}Int128.operator % when the modulus is within UInt64 #106915
    10.0.0
  • Mono AOT Benchmarks crash with PlatformNotSupportedException in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyCore #106914
  • [API Proposal]: ComObject.CreateInstance for ComWrappers #106912

Closed

  • Optimistic allocation of objects on the stack #1661
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows 4.7.0 package too large #104785
  • Default interface method is not part of the inheritance #106916
  • Wrong crossgen2 binary in artifacts/tests #80110
  • osx-arm64 NativeAOT Debug build failing with encoding_found assert #105906
    9.0.0
  • XmlSerializerTests.Xml_DerivedIXmlSerializable is failing on linux-musl legs #106865
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007054F #102210
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix errors in WhyDgml and account for cycles #106928
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] inflate function pointer types; hang indirect call wrappers on the <Module> #106926
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add lld in dependency script #106913
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Move exposed assembly object and dynamic method table out of `DomainAssembly` #106911
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix STLUR for 0 imm #106760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #106906
    area-System.Security
  • Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CommittedUsage event for segments #106831
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106897
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • error : Emscripten not found, not compiling to WebAssembly. To enable WebAssembly compilation, install Emscripten and ensure the EMSDK environment variable points to the directory containing emsdk.bat #2668

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format performs a style-breaking codefix for IDE0305 #42995

PullRequests

Merged

  • Tool install cleanup #42962
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expression spread optimization using `List<T>.AddRange(IEnumerable<T>)` skipped for `ICollection<U>` when `T` and `U` are distinct types at compile-time only #74894

PullRequests

Created

  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Semantic snippets: don't provide snippets when dotting of a type name (floow up) #74893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74891
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to an async batching work queue in teh file change listener #74884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to storing batched operations on AnalyzerReferences as just paths. #74885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move feature to only working when in 'Preview' #74886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74888
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57504
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57503
  • Perf regression: json #57502
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_ef #57501
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware #57497

Closed

    Test failures

PullRequests

Merged

  • Unquarantine Frame_MultipleStreams_RequestsNotFinished_DefaultMaxStreamsPerConnection_EnhanceYourCalmAfterDoubleMaxStreams #57471
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when attempting to create a new MAUI project #24418
  • App crash in Release Mode when binding ItemSource in CollectionView #24416
  • Shadows not rendering as expected on Android and iOS #24414
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • Make the MergedStyle and its property Style (that is of type IStyle) public #24257
    9.0-rc1
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` #24373
    9.0-rc1
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24386
    9.0-rc1
  • On ios, if IsReadOnly is true, the Editor will not be able to scroll #19500
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Keyboard events are not firing anymore #24295
    9.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Add `WindowsBatchPropertyMapper` to save unnecessary work when initializing views #24417
    community ✨
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` - fix #24376
    community ✨, 9.0-rc1
  • Use older JS API for HybridWebView test code and wait longer for web view to be ready #24408
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Add Styleable Element to simplify styling for external libraries #24387
    9.0-rc1
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
    9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    9.0-rc1
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Run device tests on the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area-xaml, community ✨, stale, t/perf

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sandboxie 5.75.0 Crack With License Key Free Download 2024 #34525
  • Query pipeline architecture issues #34524
    Backlog

Closed

  • Query pipeline architecture improvements done in 9.0 #31327
    9.0.0
  • Feature: Supported keyed registrations in AddDbContext for Cosmos #34522
  • ef migrations bundle causing runtime errors since upgrade to .Net8 #33646

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Add explicit casts for generated null in method calls. #34523
    tell-mode

Updated

  • Fix CLR type of SqlQuery projected column #34519
  • Make Discriminator_values_are_not_marked_as_unknown virtual (#34517) #34520
  • [release/9.0] Acquire the migrations database lock in a transaction. #34489
    providers-beware, tell-mode
